job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltstronggtltugtAbout UsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtLumApps teams across the world all share the same objective We want to help teams in their quest to develop strong cultures and share knowledge across communities the way we do every dayltbrgtltbrgtLumApps helps organizations transform the way they communicate collaborate and engage with their customers partners and most importantly their employees Leading companies rely on our solutions LumApps Social Collaborative Intranet and LumApps Employee Social Advocacy to make their teams more productive Our solutions contribute to smarter more efficient and betterconnected workforces around the world Because ultimately our mission is to make people feel that they belong and have a purposeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAbout The RoleltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtLumApps is seeking to add a Migrations Engineer to our current team of 4 This individual will work predominantly with our customers as well as across multiple internal teams to develop execute test and improve the process of data migration into LumApps As the Migrations Engineer for LumApps you will provide your technical expertise and product knowledge to ensure successful project implementations and project migrations working closely with customers and Professional Services teams as the SME of LumApps APIs LumApps technical functionality and integrations and LumApps migration expert This position will allow you to work side by side with our customers to define technical expectations and to address technical roadblocksltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtWhat You Will DoltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtWork with LumApps customers internal stakeholders and partners to migrate data into LumApps using REST APIs extract  transform  loadltligtltligtImprove LumApps data migration tools Python code to meet new business requirements from our customersltligtltligtResponsible for maintaining and improving python code collaborating occasionally with other developersltligtltligtResponsible for the QA execution and delivery of data migrations into LumAppsltligtltligtSME of the LumApps APIs and LumApps SDK ltligtltligtHelp create and maintain new tools that will allow Customers to migrate data into LumApps from any source export CSV XML JSON APIsltligtltligtAs part of the Professional Services Org PSO you will have to occasionally meet with customers to gather migration requirements andor to explain migration strategies to nontechnical audiencesltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat We Are Looking Forltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligt2 years of practical experience as a Migrations Engineer or Software Developerltligtltligt2 years of experience readingdebuggingwritingmaintaining code Pythonltligtltligt2 years of experience with REST APIs proficient in ETL processes ltligtltligtExperience with SQL Databases PostgresltligtltligtExperience with Python libraries like html2text beautifulsoup pdfkit redis requests httpx xmltodict pypandoc or willingness to learnltligtltligtExperience with FlaskltligtltligtComfortable working with Googles set of collaboration tools WorkspaceltligtltligtAbility to work in multiple projects with different deliverables and deadlinesltligtltligtAbility to thrive in ambiguity and a fast paced environmentltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtPreferred QualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtWorking experience with Angular Reactjs Vanilla JavaScript is a plusltligtltligtExperience with Google Cloud Platform GCP is a plusltligtltligtSystem administrator level knowledge of Linux is a plusltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtWhat We OfferltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtA program designed with your success in mind Were looking for intelligent hardworking and ethical individuals that will appreciate a wellcoached path to a rewarding careerltligtltligt100 employerpaid benefits for employees starting day oneltligtltligtAwesome coworkers and cultureltligtltligt401k with employer matchltligtltligtSo much moreltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtIf our core values of Be bold do amazing things Say what you mean Do what you say One team Same mission and Always be evolving speak to you apply to join our team todayltstronggt
